Sentencas: As the demand for green energy with high efficiency and low carbon dioxide (CO2) emissions has increased, solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) have been intensively developed in recent years.
Titulo: Performance test of a 5 kW solid oxide fuel cell system under high fuel utilization with industrial fuel gas feeding

Sentencas: Integrated gasification fuel cells (IGFCs) in particular show potential for large-scale power generation to further increase system efficiency.
Titulo: Performance test of a 5 kW solid oxide fuel cell system under high fuel utilization with industrial fuel gas feeding

Sentencas: Thus, for commercial application of IGFCs, it is important to design reliable multi-stacks for large systems that show long-term stability and practical fuel gas for application to industrial equipment.
Titulo: Performance test of a 5 kW solid oxide fuel cell system under high fuel utilization with industrial fuel gas feeding

Sentencas: In this work, a test rig (of a 5 kW SOFC system, with syngas from industrial gasifiers as fuel) was fabricated and subjected to long-term tests under high fuel utilization to investigate its performance.
Titulo: Performance test of a 5 kW solid oxide fuel cell system under high fuel utilization with industrial fuel gas feeding

Sentencas: The maximum steady output power of the system was 5700 W using hydrogen and 5660 W using syngas and the maximum steady electrical efficiency was 61.24% while the fuel utilization efficiency was 89.25%.
Titulo: Performance test of a 5 kW solid oxide fuel cell system under high fuel utilization with industrial fuel gas feeding

Sentencas: The test lasted for more than 500 h as the fuel utilization efficiency was larger than 83%.
Titulo: Performance test of a 5 kW solid oxide fuel cell system under high fuel utilization with industrial fuel gas feeding

Sentencas: The performances of each stack tower were almost identical at both the initial stage and after long-term operation.
Titulo: Performance test of a 5 kW solid oxide fuel cell system under high fuel utilization with industrial fuel gas feeding

Sentencas: After 500 h operation, the performances of the stack towers decreased only slightly under lower current and showed almost no change under high current.
Titulo: Performance test of a 5 kW solid oxide fuel cell system under high fuel utilization with industrial fuel gas feeding

Sentencas: These results demonstrate the reliability of the multi-stack design and the prospect of this SOFC power-generation system for further enlarging its application in a MWth demonstration.
Titulo: Performance test of a 5 kW solid oxide fuel cell system under high fuel utilization with industrial fuel gas feeding
